description: Joey comes from Sacramento, and he's a dude with very clear priorities - his interests are 'girls, females, cars and football' in that order. Well, that works for me, because it gives him a boner right quick when he flips on that porn and pulls down his drawers. Joey's smooth all over, with just a couple of tattoos on his upper right arm. One of them's the American flag, which goes right along with the rest of the decor! As he gives himself an extensive rubdown, he spits on his hand, deciding to use nature's lube to get him all wet and edged up instead of the usual bottle of lube I keep for the guys off-screen. Joey jerks his big meat off to a big finish, shooting a thick load all over the bedspread. I swear that flag's been the landing spot for so much cum over the years, I started calling it the ol' 'Stains & Stripes'!
title: Joey, Scene #01
